Conclusion

Ascend to stunning viewpoints and witness panoramic vistas.
Camp under the stars and immerse yourself in nature's serenity.
Explore nearby valleys and experience local wildlife.
Descend and conclude your memorable hiking expedition.
Start your exploration of historical sites in the heart of the city.
Discover hidden alleys and learn intriguing stories behind the landmarks.
Immerse yourself in the rich history and architecture of the area.
Enjoy a free day to explore at your own pace.
Wrap up your walking adventure and bid farewell to the city.
